title: Impact of COVID-19 on Nursing
itunes:title: Impact of COVID-19 on Nursing
description:
Dr. Iman Abuzeid, CEO at Incredible Health, discusses the impact of COVID-19 on nursing. Bloomberg Businessweek Features Editor Max Chafkin shares his view on private equity ruining American health care. We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg News Bond Reporter Alex Harris and Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva. Bloomberg News Sustainability Editor Emily Chasan joins for the Bloomberg Green segment and talks about how ESG funds are ready for retirement plans. And we Drive to the Close with Yana Barton, Co-Director of Growth Equities at Eaton Vance. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
